keyMoments.title: Luffy Cannot Swim Due to Devil Fruit
keyMoments.description: The flashback shows the consequence of eating a Devil Fruit when Higuma throws young Luffy into the ocean, where he cannot swim and begins to drown.
keyMoments.significance: This moment demonstrates the fundamental weakness of all Devil Fruit users and sets up the need for Shanks' rescue.

weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, Luffy cannot swim and will sink in water
